name: City Police Car Driver - Fly Car
name_original: City Police Car Driver - Fly Car
description:
Do you love police car driving games? Want to get into a criminal case? Want to fly your police car like an airplane ? City Police Car Driver - Fly Car is perfect for you! You can test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly your plane around the world discover new landscapes, Drive your police car do stunts and drifts !
FEATURES:
- Improve Airplane Flight Ability
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Beautiful Mountains and islands
- Realistic and dynamic auto physics
- Advanced airplane flight physics
- Easy and Free to use
